hook.text: What if some NFTs couldn't be sold or transferred? Soulbound tokens are tied to you permanently.

discovery.text: Unlike regular NFTs, they can't be traded. Your university degree shouldn't be sellable to someone else.

twist.text: Privacy is the challenge. Every credential on-chain is visible. Your medical history or criminal record would be public.

climax.text: Zero-knowledge proofs could solve this â€” prove credentials without revealing details. The tech is advancing fast.

punchline.text: NFTs you can't sell might be the most useful ones.

quiz.question: What makes soulbound tokens different from regular NFTs?
options: They can't be transferred or sold
